      • isCurrentOS

        public static boolean isCurrentOS(java.lang.String osname)
        Operating system check to ensure current operating system .equals user-entered operating system.
        Parameters:
        osname - String with operating system name choosen by software user.
        Returns:
        True if current operating system and operating system name are same, false otherwise.

      • isWindowsOS

        public static boolean isWindowsOS()
        Returns true if the operating system key is Windows.
        Returns:
        True if index of windows does not equal -1.

        public static java.io.File getInstallDirectory()
        Install directory is home directory.
        Returns:

      • developerMode

        public static boolean developerMode()
        Puts Simpplle into developer mode to allow editing. Sets the system property to development mode.
        Returns:
        boolean true if System property is not null and developer equals true.

      • simLoggingFile

        public static boolean simLoggingFile()
        Sets System to logging simulation mode.
        Returns:
        true if logfile is not null and logfile is this current file directory.

      • invasiveSpeciesMSUProbFile

        public static boolean invasiveSpeciesMSUProbFile()
        Sets system to invasive species Montana State University Problem File.
        Returns:
        true if Montana State University Problem file exists and is the current file.

      • determineInstallDirectory

        private static void determineInstallDirectory()
        Determines the install directory for Simpplle software package. The code source is set at JSimpplle protection domain. Sets code source location and URl to decode the URL file in UTF-8. If home directory is null sets to the file command line arguments. If Simpplle is not in development mode the home directory is at the home directory parent.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Simpplle Main method.
        Parameters:
        args -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        readXMLPropertiesFile()

      • createAndShowGUI

        private static void createAndShowGUI()
        Method to create and paint the gui interface.
        See Also:
        showSplashScreen(), determineInstallDirectory(), hideSplashScreen(), readPropertiesFile()

      • readXmlPropertiesFile

        private static void readXmlPropertiesFile()
        Reads the XML properties file with the following characteristics:
      • System.getProperty at "user.home"
      • file at key of home directory and default value "properties.xml"
      • directory designated for installation
      • file seperation
      • EOF
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
